userStories.title: Blog listing page and dynamic post template
userStories.description: As a site visitor, I need a blog section with a listing page and individual post pages so I can read SEO-optimized articles. Blog posts are programmatic SEO landing pages designed for organic traffic.
acceptanceCriteria: Create /app/blog/page.tsx — blog listing page with featured post hero and paginated post grid
Create /app/blog/[slug]/page.tsx — dynamic blog post template
Post template renders: featured image (full-width hero), title (h1), publish date, author, reading time, HTML body content, tags/categories
Post template includes sidebar or footer with related posts

Responsive design matching site dark theme and brand styling

userStories.title: Blog upload API for n8n automation
userStories.description: As an automation system (n8n), I need an API endpoint to upload blog posts via HTTP so posts can be created programmatically without manual entry.
acceptanceCriteria: Create POST /app/api/blog/upload/route.ts endpoint
Accepts JSON body: { title, slug, body (HTML string), featuredImage (URL), excerpt, author, tags, categories }
Validates required fields (title, slug, body) server-side
Stores blog post in DynamoDB (pk=BLOG#{slug}, sk=post)
Generates slug from title if not provided
Prevents duplicate slugs (409 Conflict response)
Supports update via PUT to same endpoint (upsert by slug)
Returns created/updated post with generated metadata
API key authentication via x-api-key header (env var BLOG_API_KEY)
Create GET /app/api/blog/route.ts to fetch posts for listing page
Create GET /app/api/blog/[slug]/route.ts to fetch single post
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: AI SEO/GEO metadata generation on blog upload
userStories.description: As the site owner, I need each blog post to be automatically optimized for search engines and AI discovery (GEO) when uploaded, so posts rank well without manual SEO work.
acceptanceCriteria: On blog upload, call OpenAI API to evaluate article content
AI generates: meta title (50-60 chars), meta description (150-160 chars), keywords (5-10), excerpt (if not provided)
AI generates OpenGraph title and description optimized for social sharing
AI generates BlogPosting JSON-LD structured data (headline, datePublished, author, image, publisher, description, articleBody summary)
AI generates GEO metadata: topic classification, entity extraction (people, places, organizations), content summary for AI crawlers
Store all generated metadata alongside the blog post in DynamoDB
Metadata generation is async — post is stored immediately, metadata updates within seconds
If OpenAI is unavailable, fallback to basic metadata (title as meta title, first 160 chars as description)
Create /lib/blog-seo.ts with generateBlogSEO() function
Typecheck passes

Support deleting posts from the list with confirmation
